text: Body Double is a 1984 American erotic crime thriller movie directed by Brian De Palma and starring Craig Wasson, Gregg Henry, Melanie Griffith, Deborah Shelton, Dennis Franz, Barbara Crampton. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and became a cult favorite. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 crime movies Category:1984 thriller movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:1980s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American erotic movies Category:Cult movies Category:Movies directed by Brian De Palma Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about pornography Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Body Double
